item.title: Exploring Encrypted Multifiles: A Technical Overview
item.description: Not interested in the various technical tidbits? Skip to the end-user demo at the end of the article! Table of Contents Resources Preface: Let’s talk about multifiles The brief history of multifiles A deep dive into the multifile format Our test subject The overall format Component 1: The multifile header Component 2: A typical subfile index entry Linked lists, explained Reading our first subfile index entry Subfile flags Reading our second subfile index entry But can we go beyond?
